content.raw:
We don't use sleep's as a synchronization primitive between threads. When we want to "sleep" for a certain amount of time until an event occurs we use a condition variable (happily included in C++11). We don't have any boost dependency so far, so we cannot use `deadline_timer`.

I'm describing the core library, the tests should be improved with better mechanisms to notify events between threads/processes.
